Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.motion

Class EntityMotionInitBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.motion.EntityMotionInitBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Initializable
    public class EntityMotionInitBuffer
extends Object
implements Initializable
    An EntityMotionInitBuffer is used to support the option to set the speed and direction of an Entity from the constructor.

    The motion of an Entity is controlled by and delegated to a MotionModifier and this MotionModifier is injected during the initialization phase of an Entity. This phase comes after the constructor is called.

    An EntityMotionInitBuffer therefor stores the speed and direction of an Entity and delegates the value to the MotionModifier
